thread.title: Pensioner dies after going missing in nightwear
thread.title_full: Pensioner dies after going missing in nightwear

title: Pensioner dies after going missing in nightwear
text:
Pensioner dies after going missing in nightwear Independent.ie An elderly woman who went missing while dressed in nightwear has died in hospital, police said. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/pensioner-dies-after-going-missing-in-nightwear-35442776.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35440475.ece/db6c5/AUTOCROP/h342/carlton.JPG An elderly woman who went missing while dressed in nightwear has died in hospital, police said. Share Pensioner dies after going missing in nightwear Independent.ie An elderly woman who went missing while dressed in nightwear has died in hospital, police said. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/pensioner-dies-after-going-missing-in-nightwear-35442776.html Comments 
Jean McAllister (81) disappeared from her home in Bangor in Co Down on Thursday night. 
PSNI Inspector Stephen McGuigan said: "Mrs McAllister was found this afternoon near to where she went missing in the Ashbury area of the town. 
"We would pay tribute to local residents and the Community Rescue Service who worked so hard to find Mrs McAllister. 
"Our thoughts are with the family at this sad time."
